title: Bloomberg Markets: Piegza, Lowell Discuss April Jobs Report
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Piegza, Lowell Discuss April Jobs Report
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Lindsey Piegza Chief Economist Stifel Financial Jim Lowell Chief Investment Officer Adviser Investments Discussing impact of April jobs report on the markets, the economy and Fed policy. The unemployment rate unexpectedly dropped to 4.4 percent, the lowest since May 2007, Labor Department data showed Friday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
